tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited her for metal free zirconia crowns  and she did it quite well without giving any pain,she explained the procedure completely before starting, the crowns come from a lab in Kerala which has European standards I appreciate the transparency she even gave me the warranty card from the Kerala lab and finished the work timely.Im completely satisfied  will definitely come back next time I'm in kolkata. 
The clinic is clean and the staff are helpful
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback.We keep the transpercy in all the dental treatments and we inform the patient prior to that treatment including the cost,the material we use and the lab in which we are sending the case.

review:
I'm happy with dr.arpita she was gentle and kind with the treatment must commend there was no pain , before the injection I was given a topical gel to numb the gums so that the pain of the injection was almost zero,the crowns also where metal free little expensive but it was worth with the 15 years of warranty and they were done from a Mumbai Lab they even gave me the lab box and the cards associated I really liked the transparency

reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. it's always a pleasure to give comfort to the patient and we always try to keep transperacy in work for the betterment of the treatment.
